name: Strip Black Jack - Manga Edition
description:
Details:

You always wanted to know how your neighbour's adult and beautiful daughter looks naked and maybe even sleep with her? 
Well, now's your chance! With this amazing game "Strip Black Jack"!

But if you play against her quirky father, you can quickly change that.

When she is really horny she will satisfy you.

In the end, you even get to sleep with her!

  • At the beginning she's fully dressed. At highest striptease level she plays with her dildo!
